official-title.#text:
Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 5230) making supplemental appropriations for the
			 fiscal year ending September 30, 2014, and for other purposes; providing
			 for consideration of the bill (H.R. 5272) to prohibit certain actions with
			 respect to deferred action for aliens not lawfully present in the United
			 States, and for other purposes; providing for consideration of the Senate
			 amendment to the bill (H.R. 5021) to provide an extension of Federal-aid
			 highway, highway safety, motor carrier safety, transit, and other programs
			 funded out of the Highway Trust Fund, and for other purposes; and for
			 other purposes.
